  • Field Details

    • importanceLevel

      @SerializedName("importance_level") @Expose private int importanceLevel
      The importance level of the event in int. It is ranged from 0 to 3, from the least to the most important. It is exposed to Gson, can be both serialized and deserialized. It will be serialized as importance_level.

    • dueDate

      @SerializedName("due_date") @Expose private java.lang.Long dueDate
      The due date of the event timestamp, in seconds, in Long. It is exposed to Gson, can be both serialized and deserialized. It will be serialized as due_date.

    • duration

      @Expose private java.lang.Long duration
      The duration of the event in seconds, in Long. It is exposed to Gson, can be both serialized and deserialized.

    • lastGeneratedDate

      @SerializedName("last_generated_date") @Expose private java.lang.Long lastGeneratedDate
      The date of this event appears in Today board last time timestamp, in seconds, in Long. It is exposed to Gson, can be both serialized and deserialized. It will be serialized as last_geenrated_date.

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String note, java.lang.Long dueDate, java.lang.Long duration, int importanceLevel, Node parent)
      Constructor of Event, provide HttpBody.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the event
      note - the note of the event
      dueDate - the due date in timestamp of the event
      duration - the duration of the event
      importanceLevel - the importance level of the event
      parent - the parent node of the event
